Fwd eService Online Flight Purchase Confirmation Received from mtarcsntxswbellnet mtaprrcsntxswbellnet by simsrcsntxswbellnet Sun Internet Mail Server simsp with ESMTP id for imsmsdaemon Fri Mar CST Received from smtpoutexpediacom by mtarcsntxswbellnet Sun Internet Mail Server simsp with ESMTP id for imsrcsntxswbellnet Fri Mar CST Received from by smtpoutexpediacom with Microsoft SMTPSVC Fri Mar Date Fri Mar From Subject eService Online Flight Purchase Confirmation To Messageid XMozillaStatus Thank you for booking your travel with Continental Airlines Below is a copy of your flight information Please refer to your complete online itinerary for the respective details on your hotel and car reservations For flight checkin and departure information please contact your airline directly FLIGHT SUMMARY ETicket Confirmed Itinerary Number Round Trip Booking ID EFSXN adult USD Taxes USD Total Cost USD Flight from Houston TX IAHBush Intercontinental to Washington DC DCARonald Reagan National Depart Apr at PM Arrive Apr at PM Depart Houston IAH Apr at PM Arrive Washington DC DCA Apr at PM Flight Continental Aircraft Boeing MD Meal Service Snack Duration hr mn Distance mi EconomyCoach Class Flight from Washington DC DCARonald Reagan National to Houston TX IAHBush Intercontinental Depart Apr at AM Arrive Apr at AM Depart Washington DC DCA Apr at AM Arrive Houston IAH Apr at AM Flight Continental Aircraft Boeing MD Meal Service Breakfast Duration hr mn Distance mi EconomyCoach Class If you have chosen the Eticket option for your flights a Travel Itinerary and Receipt will be delivered within days via US mail If you have specified an alternate delivery location for your Eticket we will send a Travel Itinerary and Receipt to the address you specified plus a Payment Receipt to the address that appears on your credit card statement When you arrive at the airport on the day of your flight please provide the ticket agent with your last name flight number and photo identification to receive your boarding passes For curbside checkin present your passenger receipt or a printout of this message and photo ID ETicket customers can also use one of our automated eService Centers or ESC Our ESCs allow customers to checkin and receive a boarding pass for all Continental US domestic flights ESCs are conveniently located near the ticket counter and gate areas in most of our US cities Baggage check is available at those ESCs located at the ticket counter If ETickets are not available for your flights or you have elected to receive a paper ticket we will send your tickets and receipts to the address you specified during the booking process If your date of departure is within days and ETicket is available for your flights an ETicket will be issued If ETicket is not available you will have been prompted online to call Continental Airlines eService Online at to arrange the delivery of your tickets between and business days from today by nd day or overnight mail more than business days from today by US mail Photo identification will be required upon checkin such as a Drivers License Military ID Passport or an official identification card issued by a government authority For questions concerning this requirement please contact Continental Airlines or visit our web site at A valid passport is required for international travel Some countries also have visa andor health requirements Please check with the embassy of the country to which you are traveling contact Continental Airlines or visit our web site at If you wish to change hotel and car reservations use Continental Airlines eService Online at To change airline flights or for enroute assistance call Please have your itinerary number available for the agent We wish you a pleasant trip and look forward to serving you again soon Continental Airlines

Fwd eBay Congratulations youre the winning bidderbit Returnpath Received from mtarcsntxswbellnet mtaprrcsntxswbellnet by simsrcsntxswbellnet Sun Internet Mail Server simsp with ESMTP id for imsmsdaemon Wed Jun CDT Received from cronandalecom by mtarcsntxswbellnet Sun Internet Mail Server simsp with ESMTP id for imsrcsntxswbellnet Wed Jun CDT Received from cron localhost by cronandalecom Sun with SMTP id PAA Wed Jun PDT Date Wed Jun PDT From Paul Cymrot Subject eBay Congratulations youre the winning bidder To Replyto Paul Cymrot Messageid JavaMail ron MIMEversion Contenttype textplain charsetusascii XMozillaStatus Congratulations You won my auction Item Title Art Catalogue Jene Highstein Winning Bid Number of Items My email address Please click the link below to provide me with your name address and payment preferences so that I can process your order quickly byrMaincNofx Still shopping from me PLEASE IGNORE THIS EMAIL I will send you another email in days That way I can ship you all of your items at one time HAVING TROUBLE If clicking on this link doesnt take you to my checkout please copy and paste the link into your browser OR Come to wwwandalecom and click on Pay and Track under the Buyer Services box Follow the instructions on that page Thank you for bidding on my auction I appreciate your bidhope to see you again Thanks for your business Riverby For all questions about this auction please email me at

Fwd Collecting Fine Wine Just Got Easierbit Returnpath Received from mtarcsntxswbellnet mtaprrcsntxswbellnet by simsrcsntxswbellnet Sun Internet Mail Server simsp with ESMTP id Thu Jun CDT Received from listswinebidcom by mtarcsntxswbellnet Sun Internet Mail Server simsp with SMTP id Thu Jun CDT Received from winebidcom by listswinebidcom with SMTP Thu Jun Date Thu Jun From winebidcom Subject Collecting Fine Wine Just Got Easier Sender To June Messageid BDE MIMEversion Contenttype textplain charsetUSASCII Precedence Bulk UserAgent MicrosoftEntourage XMozillaStatus At WINEBIDCOM we believe collecting fine wine should be enjoyable and easy So weve made a few changes to our online auction that we think will streamline browsing and bidding for your favorite wines From now on your email address will serve as your identification code When you sign in simply use your email address and the same password you use now This means you no longer have to remember a digit identification code Type in your email address and the same password youve always used and youre ready to go Youll also notice that WINEBIDCOM is now one big global auction If youre hunting for Bordeaux you no longer need to look in three separate auctions All the Bordeaux offered for bid will appear in a single auction regardless of where Winebidcom is storing it This way you wont miss a single bottle As in the past we show you where WINEBIDCOM is holding the wine and wines stored in countries other than the one in which you live are still subject to added taxes duties and shipping charges Finally we hope youll notice the results of some of our behind the scenes technological improvements We want to minimize the time you spend waiting for information about Bordeaux Burgundies Chardonnays Cabernets Pinot Noirs or whatever fine wines youre adding to your cellar We want to make it simple to find the worlds most exceptional wines Our next auction begins opening Thursday June at pm EDT Happy hunting If you click on a link in this email and it doesnt open properly in your browser try copying and pasting the link directly into your browsers address or location field Forget your password ossendpasswordshtml To be removed from the mailing list click here osmailinglistshtml Be sure to visit the updates page for policy changes aboutwinebidupdateshtml

Fwd Auction Invoice Shipping Confirmation Received from mtarcsntxswbellnet mtaprrcsntxswbellnet by simsrcsntxswbellnet Sun Internet Mail Server simsp with ESMTP id for imsmsdaemon Thu Jun CDT Received from winebidcom by mtarcsntxswbellnet Sun Internet Mail Server simsp with ESMTP id for imsrcsntxswbellnet Thu Jun CDT Received from winebidcom by winebidcom with SMTP id LAA Thu Jun EDT Date Thu Jun EDT From Winebidcom Subject Auction Invoice Shipping Confirmation To Messageid XMozillaStatus Congratulations We are pleased to inform you that you are the winning bidder on one or more lots in our auction IMPORTANT PLEASE READ THIS ENTIRE MESSAGE It provides you with instructions on how to ensure that your wine is shipped according to your instructions with the lowest risk of loss or breakage in shipment YOU MUST RETURN A SEPARATE CONFIRMATION FOR EACH AUCTION IN WHICH YOU HAVE WINNING BIDS Below you will find an invoice for the lots you won in this auction along with the estimated charges for shipping packaging and insurance Follow these steps to expedite your order PRINT OUT THIS EMAIL VERIFY THAT YOUR BILLING AND SHIPPING ADDRESSES ARE SHOWN CORRECTLY or make any necessary changes to them Choose your shipping address carefully although we use our best efforts to ship your wine when weather conditions are favorable winebidcom is not responsible for damage caused by exposure to heat or cold Please also note any special shipping instructions INDICATE YOUR PREFERRED METHOD OF PAYMENT Unless you tell us otherwise we will charge the credit card number you have on file with us as of the close of the auction If you have changed your credit card since please let us know If you would prefer to send a check or use a wire transfer please see the procedure for doing so below IF THIS IS YOUR FIRST PURCHASE of wine from winebidcom please make a copy of your proof of age and mail it to winebidcom PO Box Napa CA with your shipping authorization FAX THE PRINTED CONFIRMATION TO or mail it to winebidcom PO Box Napa CA AS WE MUST PAY OUR SELLERS IN A TIMELY MANNER IF WE DO NOT RECEIVE YOUR SIGNED CONFIRMATION WITHIN DAYS OF THE AUCTION CLOSE YOUR CREDIT CARD ON FILE WILL BE CHARGED HOWEVER WE CAN NOT SHIP YOUR WINE UNTIL WE RECEIVE YOUR SIGNED CONFIRMATION AND PROOF OF AGE Once weve received your faxed confirmation we will charge your credit card for the hammer price of the wine the premium sales tax if applicable and shipping insurance We will charge the shipping and handling when the wine is actually shipped If you have purchased wine from both our West Coast and Midwest storage and service facilities we will transfer the wine to the facility closest to your shipping address by temperaturecontrolled truck to consolidate your shipment Following are answers to some common questions regarding our service and our procedures after the auction has closed HOW LONG WILL IT TAKE TO SHIP MY WINE Because of the complexity in sorting individual bottles from hundreds of consignors for shipment to thousands of different customers as well as the time it takes to transfer wine between our facilities please allow two to three weeks after we receive your faxed confirmation before expecting shipment If you have an urgent need for the wine please drop us an email at and well attempt to accommodate your request Please also see the information on weather below WHAT ABOUT TEMPERATURE ISSUES Prior to shipping any wine winebidcoms customer service staff checks the weather forecast at our shipping facility and at your delivery zip code If the forecast is too warm or too cold we will hold the shipment until the weather is more favorable We only ship second day air shipments during the first half of the week so your wine wont sit in the shippers warehouse over the weekend For older vintages or very high value wines we recommend that you arrange to pick up the wine at one of our facilities or use a ground carrier with temperaturecontrolled trucks to minimize the risk of damage Older corks have a tendency to fail during air shipments HOW IS MY WINE SHIPPED We recommend the use of twoday service to ship your wines to minimize the time the wine is exposed to temperature extremes on a truck or in a warehouse If you would like to use next day service or standard ground service please let us know and well provide a revised estimate of shipping charges All international shipments are sent by air IS THE WINE INSURED Yes Winebidcom has found that UPS FedEx and other shippers frequently do not honor claims for damaged wine shipments so we have purchased and arranged for outside insurance coverage and provide it to all of our customers at a rate of of the hammer price of the wine This insurance is mandatory and is administrated by winebidcom If your shipment suffers loss damage or breakage please contact our customer service department to make a claim Our insurance does not cover claims of spoilage or damage from heat or cold during shipment HOW CAN I SAVE MONEY ON FREIGHT CHARGES We strongly recommend that fine and rare wines be shipped by air Given the weight of wine this can be expensive If you would like us to use less expensive ground shipment let us know Also if your purchase from this auction is for less than a full case consider allowing us to store your wine until it can be combined with purchases from future auctions to make a single larger shipment Sending multiple shipments of one or two bottles at a time is far less efficient than shipping full case lots INVOICE Michael McKeogh Daytime Tel Fax Number Email Billing Michael McKeogh Poydras Suite New Orleans LA Shipping Michael McKeogh Sara Shackleton Coleridge Houston TX Special Instructions Visa LOT VINTAGE Size ml bottle Kistler Hirsch Vineyard Pinot Noir LOT VINTAGE Size ml bottle Williams Selyem Allen Vineyard Pinot Noir LOT VINTAGE Size ml bottles Gary Farrell Pinot Noir LOT VINTAGE Size ml bottle Gary Farrell Pinot Noir LOT VINTAGE Size ml bottle Williams Selyem Olivet Lane Vineyard Pinot Noir Subtotal Shipping UPS nd Day Rates Packing Handling Tax Premium and Shipping Insurance Total Now Due Michael McKeogh Daytime Tel Fax Number Email SHIPPING POLICY The primary means of distribution will be common carrier All wines are sold in Illinois or California depending on which service and storage facility is used and ownership possession and control of the wine passes to buyer in Illinois or California in accordance with the Uniform Commercial Code and sales and use tax provisions governing auctions We make no representation as to the rights of anyone to import wine into any state outside Illinois or California The buyer is solely responsible for shipment of their wines By participating in these auctions you authorize us to act on your behalf to deliver your wine to you at a location in Illinois or California where the wine may be picked up by you stored for pickup by you or shipped by you via common carrier to such other location as you may from time to time direct Should you choose to authorize a common carrier to ship your wine from the storage and service facility it will be at your own ris k For your information wines may be sold and delivered only to persons who are at least years old and the various state and municipal shipping regulations governing alcohol around the country vary tremendously At any given time regulations previously authorizing shipment could be repealed and vice versa It is the responsibility of the owner of the wine to be familiar with the regulations of whatever jurisdiction he or she chooses to ship the wine into By placing bids in these auctions you are representing that you are at least years old and the person to whom your wine will be delivered is also at least years old The person receiving delivery will be required to show identification proving that he or she is at least years old Choose a method of payment a Payment by Credit Card Your card will automatically be charged the total amount above b Payment by Check Payment in full must be received within days A fee applies to all returned checks Make check payable to Winebidcom Inc and mail it to PO Box Napa CA c Payment by Wire Please inquire for instructions NOTE Shipping authorization I have read and understand Winebidcoms shipping policy By signing this invoice I am verifying that I am at least years old and the shipping address is correct If needed I authorize Winebidcom to store my wine at no charge in a temperature controlled storage until the weather permits shipment and to charge my credit card for the full purchase price at this time Sign here X authorizing Winebidcom to act on your behalf to make arrangements for the shipment of your order Thanks from all of us at Winebidcom Michael McKeogh Daytime Tel Fax Number Email

Fwd Visit to your winerybit Returnpath Received from mtarcsntxswbellnet mtaprrcsntxswbellnet by simsrcsntxswbellnet Sun Internet Mail Server simsp with ESMTP id for imsmsdaemon Mon Sep CDT Received from marinesonicnet by mtarcsntxswbellnet Sun Internet Mail Server simsp with SMTP id for imsrcsntxswbellnet Mon Sep CDT Received qmail invoked from network Tue Sep Received from subsonicnet by marinesonicnet with SMTP Tue Sep Received from loie enassonicnet by subsonicnet with SMTP id VAA for Mon Sep Date Mon Sep From Dan Goldfield Subject Re Visit to your winery To Messageid cdebaecdloie MIMEversion XMailer Microsoft Outlook Express Contenttype textplain charsetiso Xenvelopeinfo XMSMailPriority Normal XMimeOLE Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V References XPriority XMozillaStatus Sara Im looking foreword to seeing you Lets speak by phone before you come in Im sure we could work something out on one of the days you prefer Im in the thick of it fight now so its a bit hard to think of the specifics at the moment Looking foreword to speaking with you dan Original Message From To Sent Monday September PM Subject Visit to your winery Hi Dan Ill be in NapaSonoma during the second week of October specifically on Monday Wednesday October and Please let me know which day is convenient for you for me to drop by and say hello and take that case of pinot noir off your hands If the timing works for you I think that Tuesday or Wednesday would be preferable for me Ill be staying in Napa I look forward to hearing from you I hope you received me earlier message Thanks Sara

Fwd shippingbit Returnpath Received from mtarcsntxswbellnet mtaprrcsntxswbellnet by simsrcsntxswbellnet Sun Internet Mail Server simsp with ESMTP id for imsmsdaemon Mon Nov CST Received from emailcatnetnet by mtarcsntxswbellnet Sun Internet Mail Server simsp with ESMTP id for imsrcsntxswbellnet Mon Nov CST Received from by emailcatmerryedwardscom NTMail KWffbcc with ESMTP id rovgdaaa for Mon Nov Date Mon Nov From Merry Edwards wines Subject Re shipping To Messageid cdcaefeamerry MIMEversion XMailer Microsoft Outlook Express Contenttype textplain charsetiso XMSMailPriority Normal XMimeOLE Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V References XPriority XMozillaStatus We can ship through a special shipper We need to charge Calif sales tax of we have Russian River magnums available at eachPlease call for shipping costs Thanks Jackie Meredith Vineyard Estate Inc Speer Ranch Road Forestville CA P F Original Message From To Sent Friday November PM Subject shipping Hi I tasted your wine in Houston Dan Lyons visited your winery several months ago and loved it I have two questions Can you now ship to Louisiana which I understand is a permit state and tell me about your magnums and pricing I look forward to hearing from you Thanks Sara Shackleton

FW Artist Xiaoze Xie Work May Original Message From Mary Dohne mailto Sent Tuesday January PM To Sara Subject RE Artist Xiaoze Xie Work May Dear Sara Almost all of the pieces on artnetcom are still available The information is as follows Chinese Library No Chinese Library No Chinese Library No May Untitled The Soviet Tank In addition we will be getting more works in the gallery for our exhibition in March Let me know if you are interested in seeing images of the new pieces and Ill email them to you Best Mary Dohne Charles Cowles Gallery West th Street New York NY tel fax wwwcowlesgallerycom Original Message From Sara mailto Sent Monday January PM To Subject Artist Xiaoze Xie Work May I am interested in this artist available works and prices Can you please advise if pieces featured on artnetcom or others are available I own two paintings Thank you Sara Shackleton Coleridge Houston TX work

FW KISTLER VINEYARDS SPRING RELEASEOriginal Message From Bill Lewis mailto Sent Friday February PM To Subject KISTLER VINEYARDS SPRING RELEASE February Dear Ms Shackleton You very recently requested that your name be added to the Kistler Vineyards mailing list Fortunately we were able to add you starting with the current Spring release Your newsletter and order form are being mailed today Please read the introductory letter and newsletter carefully then respond as quickly as possible preferably via an overnight service We do need a check and an order of bottles or more within your allocation to process your order Before you return your order please fill in any information that is not included on your form Please include a shipping address and telephone even if it is the same as your mailing address We are mailing your offer to SARA SHACKLETON COLERIDGE HOUSTON TX I look forward to receiving your order and welcome you as a Kistler Vineyards Mailing List member Best regards Bill Lewis Kistler Vineyards
list Project list templatedoc

FW DRCs Other top BurgundiesOriginal Message From mailto Sent Wednesday February PM To Subject DRCs Other top Burgundies Dear Ms Sara Shackleton DRCs Other top Burgundies We have our extremely tiny allocation of Domaine de la RomaneeConti Prices are high but a good bit less than some weve seen Ive indicated the number of bottles available These are due in a couple of months Plus some other outstanding Red Burgundies which have just arrived All are net priced Some ie Mugneret and Pousse dOr are even reasonable DRC Vosne DuvaultBlochet net DRC Echezeaux net DRC Grands Echezeaux net DRC RomaneeStVivant net DRC Richebourg net DRC La Tache net DRC RomaneeConti net The DRCs director Aubert de Villaine considers these among the best wines he has ever made In fact as Burghound explains he doesnt think it is possible to have better grapes than he had in These are historic wines and the demand for them unprecedented de Vogue ChambolleMusigny net Just one case left As you probably know much of this is from very fancy declassified fruit Mugneret VosneRomanee net Mugneret Nuits Chaignots net Nobody makes purer classier or more classic red Burgundies than Mugneret and these s are just beautiful The Nuits Chaignots is always a favorite and this is probably the most delicious I can remember And as Tanzer says the VosneRomanee is rich and fine with lovely fruit and plaint texture This has superb fruit for a village wine These are red Burgundies for purists and are still quite affordable given the esteem of this estate At least theyre affordable here Tanzer prices them at and Pousse dOr Santenay Clos Tavannes net Pousse dOr Volnay Clos de lAudignac net Pousse dOr Volnay Ouvrees net Pousse dOr Volnay Bousse dOr net is the comeback vintage for this historic estate And the prices are still remarkably reasonable for whats in the bottle Burghound the only American critic to review them so far and a quite conservative one rates the Santenay Clos Tavannes points Its absolutely delicious The Volnay Clos de lAudignac is positively effusive with its exquisite nose of sexy seductive black fruit and perfumed aromatics followed by sexy beautifully detailed and rich flavors of juicy succulent crushed berries and cassis Yet for all the fireworks it somehow manages to remain completely Volnay in character Lovely stuff If this sounds good it is And believe it or not the top two Pousse dOr monopolies the famous Clos des SoixanteOuvrees and Clos de la Bousse dOr are even better Once again these superb wines are among Volnays elite Orders you cancel are subject to a restocking fee To update your personal information and email preferences resubscribe at Subscribesubscribehtml Your old information will be deleted To remove yourself from the mailing list select cgibinsubscribecgiactiondeleteEmailsshack At Carolina Wine Company we dont sell disappointments frills or a fancy image We sell wine Carolina Wine Company Hillsborough Street Raleigh NC Phone Fax email

Fwd Thank you for choosing Bank of AmericaReturnpath Received from mtarcsntxswbellnet mtaprrcsntxswbellnet by simsrcsntxswbellnet Sun Internet Mail Server simsp with ESMTP id for imsmsdaemon Sun Nov CST Received from maillendingtreecom by mtarcsntxswbellnet Sun Internet Mail Server simsp with ESMTP id for imsrcsntxswbellnet Sun Nov CST Received from KOPLlendingtreecom by maillendingtreecom PostOffice MTA v release ID ULSV with ESMTP id com for Sun Nov Date Sun Nov CST Datewarning Date header was inserted by mtarcsntxswbellnet From Customer Service Subject Thank you for choosing Bank of America Sender To Sara Shackleton Messageid XMailer Perl MailInternet v XMozillaStatus Dear Sara Shackleton Please visit the prequalification status page at NewStatusloginaspbpbofaSI for easy return access bookmark this page using your login and password to view the status of your prequalification request Your status may indicate an eligible offer or that we need more information from you before we can proceed with your request If you receive an offer online you may choose to accept it by the time specified on your status page If you are unable to accept before the offer expires just update the offers to see the most recent rates and terms Once you accept a Bank of America Account Executive will contact you to complete a loan application You may also accept an offer by calling us at Monday through Friday from am until pm Central time Offers are only valid until the time specified on your status page If your status indicates that we need more information please call an Account Executive at the number referenced above Please remember that rates and fees are subject to change until you complete a loan application and lock your interest rate Also you may receive multiple emails depending on how many products you selected on the prequalification form This is a postonly message which you may not respond to Should you need to reach us please contact us at the number listed above We look forward to serving your mortgage needs Bank of America

FW DuttonGoldfieldOriginal Message From Jill Melendy mailto Sent Tuesday February PM To Subject DuttonGoldfield Dear Sara I apologize for the delay but I have been unsuccessful in finding a good way to get you your wine I am unable to ship FedEx or UPS unless it is going to a distributor We have some customers who live in similar unfriendly wine states who make arrangements with private mailing companies here in California and we have mailed it to them Unfortunately the danger in us doing it is it could get held up somewhere along the way and they may destroy it I believe it is too much wine to risk the possibility I will continue to look into other possibilities but if you have any suggestions or are planning to be in another state soon please let me know and I will do whatever I can to get it to you Regards Jill Melendy DuttonGoldfield Winery Send and receive Hotmail on your mobile device

FW DRCs Other top BurgundiesOriginal Message From mailto Sent Wednesday February PM To Subject DRCs Other top Burgundies Dear Ms Sara Shackleton DRCs Other top Burgundies We have our extremely tiny allocation of Domaine de la RomaneeConti Prices are high but a good bit less than some weve seen Ive indicated the number of bottles available These are due in a couple of months Plus some other outstanding Red Burgundies which have just arrived All are net priced Some ie Mugneret and Pousse dOr are even reasonable DRC Vosne DuvaultBlochet net DRC Echezeaux net DRC Grands Echezeaux net DRC RomaneeStVivant net DRC Richebourg net DRC La Tache net DRC RomaneeConti net The DRCs director Aubert de Villaine considers these among the best wines he has ever made In fact as Burghound explains he doesnt think it is possible to have better grapes than he had in These are historic wines and the demand for them unprecedented de Vogue ChambolleMusigny net Just one case left As you probably know much of this is from very fancy declassified fruit Mugneret VosneRomanee net Mugneret Nuits Chaignots net Nobody makes purer classier or more classic red Burgundies than Mugneret and these s are just beautiful The Nuits Chaignots is always a favorite and this is probably the most delicious I can remember And as Tanzer says the VosneRomanee is rich and fine with lovely fruit and plaint texture This has superb fruit for a village wine These are red Burgundies for purists and are still quite affordable given the esteem of this estate At least theyre affordable here Tanzer prices them at and Pousse dOr Santenay Clos Tavannes net Pousse dOr Volnay Clos de lAudignac net Pousse dOr Volnay Ouvrees net Pousse dOr Volnay Bousse dOr net is the comeback vintage for this historic estate And the prices are still remarkably reasonable for whats in the bottle Burghound the only American critic to review them so far and a quite conservative one rates the Santenay Clos Tavannes points Its absolutely delicious The Volnay Clos de lAudignac is positively effusive with its exquisite nose of sexy seductive black fruit and perfumed aromatics followed by sexy beautifully detailed and rich flavors of juicy succulent crushed berries and cassis Yet for all the fireworks it somehow manages to remain completely Volnay in character Lovely stuff If this sounds good it is And believe it or not the top two Pousse dOr monopolies the famous Clos des SoixanteOuvrees and Clos de la Bousse dOr are even better Once again these superb wines are among Volnays elite Orders you cancel are subject to a restocking fee To update your personal information and email preferences resubscribe at Subscribesubscribehtml Your old information will be deleted To remove yourself from the mailing list select cgibinsubscribecgiactiondeleteEmailsshack At Carolina Wine Company we dont sell disappointments frills or a fancy image We sell wine Carolina Wine Company Hillsborough Street Raleigh NC Phone Fax email

Fwd Auction Invoice Shipping Confirmation Received from mtarcsntxswbellnet mtaprrcsntxswbellnet by simsrcsntxswbellnet Sun Internet Mail Server simsp with ESMTP id for imsmsdaemon Thu Jun CDT Received from winebidcom by mtarcsntxswbellnet Sun Internet Mail Server simsp with ESMTP id for imsrcsntxswbellnet Thu Jun CDT Received from winebidcom by winebidcom with SMTP id LAA Thu Jun EDT Date Thu Jun EDT From Winebidcom Subject Auction Invoice Shipping Confirmation To Messageid XMozillaStatus Congratulations We are pleased to inform you that you are the winning bidder on one or more lots in our auction IMPORTANT PLEASE READ THIS ENTIRE MESSAGE It provides you with instructions on how to ensure that your wine is shipped according to your instructions with the lowest risk of loss or breakage in shipment YOU MUST RETURN A SEPARATE CONFIRMATION FOR EACH AUCTION IN WHICH YOU HAVE WINNING BIDS Below you will find an invoice for the lots you won in this auction along with the estimated charges for shipping packaging and insurance Follow these steps to expedite your order PRINT OUT THIS EMAIL VERIFY THAT YOUR BILLING AND SHIPPING ADDRESSES ARE SHOWN CORRECTLY or make any necessary changes to them Choose your shipping address carefully although we use our best efforts to ship your wine when weather conditions are favorable winebidcom is not responsible for damage caused by exposure to heat or cold Please also note any special shipping instructions INDICATE YOUR PREFERRED METHOD OF PAYMENT Unless you tell us otherwise we will charge the credit card number you have on file with us as of the close of the auction If you have changed your credit card since please let us know If you would prefer to send a check or use a wire transfer please see the procedure for doing so below IF THIS IS YOUR FIRST PURCHASE of wine from winebidcom please make a copy of your proof of age and mail it to winebidcom PO Box Napa CA with your shipping authorization FAX THE PRINTED CONFIRMATION TO or mail it to winebidcom PO Box Napa CA AS WE MUST PAY OUR SELLERS IN A TIMELY MANNER IF WE DO NOT RECEIVE YOUR SIGNED CONFIRMATION WITHIN DAYS OF THE AUCTION CLOSE YOUR CREDIT CARD ON FILE WILL BE CHARGED HOWEVER WE CAN NOT SHIP YOUR WINE UNTIL WE RECEIVE YOUR SIGNED CONFIRMATION AND PROOF OF AGE Once weve received your faxed confirmation we will charge your credit card for the hammer price of the wine the premium sales tax if applicable and shipping insurance We will charge the shipping and handling when the wine is actually shipped If you have purchased wine from both our West Coast and Midwest storage and service facilities we will transfer the wine to the facility closest to your shipping address by temperaturecontrolled truck to consolidate your shipment Following are answers to some common questions regarding our service and our procedures after the auction has closed HOW LONG WILL IT TAKE TO SHIP MY WINE Because of the complexity in sorting individual bottles from hundreds of consignors for shipment to thousands of different customers as well as the time it takes to transfer wine between our facilities please allow two to three weeks after we receive your faxed confirmation before expecting shipment If you have an urgent need for the wine please drop us an email at and well attempt to accommodate your request Please also see the information on weather below WHAT ABOUT TEMPERATURE ISSUES Prior to shipping any wine winebidcoms customer service staff checks the weather forecast at our shipping facility and at your delivery zip code If the forecast is too warm or too cold we will hold the shipment until the weather is more favorable We only ship second day air shipments during the first half of the week so your wine wont sit in the shippers warehouse over the weekend For older vintages or very high value wines we recommend that you arrange to pick up the wine at one of our facilities or use a ground carrier with temperaturecontrolled trucks to minimize the risk of damage Older corks have a tendency to fail during air shipments HOW IS MY WINE SHIPPED We recommend the use of twoday service to ship your wines to minimize the time the wine is exposed to temperature extremes on a truck or in a warehouse If you would like to use next day service or standard ground service please let us know and well provide a revised estimate of shipping charges All international shipments are sent by air IS THE WINE INSURED Yes Winebidcom has found that UPS FedEx and other shippers frequently do not honor claims for damaged wine shipments so we have purchased and arranged for outside insurance coverage and provide it to all of our customers at a rate of of the hammer price of the wine This insurance is mandatory and is administrated by winebidcom If your shipment suffers loss damage or breakage please contact our customer service department to make a claim Our insurance does not cover claims of spoilage or damage from heat or cold during shipment HOW CAN I SAVE MONEY ON FREIGHT CHARGES We strongly recommend that fine and rare wines be shipped by air Given the weight of wine this can be expensive If you would like us to use less expensive ground shipment let us know Also if your purchase from this auction is for less than a full case consider allowing us to store your wine until it can be combined with purchases from future auctions to make a single larger shipment Sending multiple shipments of one or two bottles at a time is far less efficient than shipping full case lots INVOICE Michael McKeogh Daytime Tel Fax Number Email Billing Michael McKeogh Poydras Suite New Orleans LA Shipping Michael McKeogh Sara Shackleton Coleridge Houston TX Special Instructions Visa LOT VINTAGE Size ml bottle Kistler Hirsch Vineyard Pinot Noir LOT VINTAGE Size ml bottle Williams Selyem Allen Vineyard Pinot Noir LOT VINTAGE Size ml bottles Gary Farrell Pinot Noir LOT VINTAGE Size ml bottle Gary Farrell Pinot Noir LOT VINTAGE Size ml bottle Williams Selyem Olivet Lane Vineyard Pinot Noir Subtotal Shipping UPS nd Day Rates Packing Handling Tax Premium and Shipping Insurance Total Now Due Michael McKeogh Daytime Tel Fax Number Email SHIPPING POLICY The primary means of distribution will be common carrier All wines are sold in Illinois or California depending on which service and storage facility is used and ownership possession and control of the wine passes to buyer in Illinois or California in accordance with the Uniform Commercial Code and sales and use tax provisions governing auctions We make no representation as to the rights of anyone to import wine into any state outside Illinois or California The buyer is solely responsible for shipment of their wines By participating in these auctions you authorize us to act on your behalf to deliver your wine to you at a location in Illinois or California where the wine may be picked up by you stored for pickup by you or shipped by you via common carrier to such other location as you may from time to time direct Should you choose to authorize a common carrier to ship your wine from the storage and service facility it will be at your own ris k For your information wines may be sold and delivered only to persons who are at least years old and the various state and municipal shipping regulations governing alcohol around the country vary tremendously At any given time regulations previously authorizing shipment could be repealed and vice versa It is the responsibility of the owner of the wine to be familiar with the regulations of whatever jurisdiction he or she chooses to ship the wine into By placing bids in these auctions you are representing that you are at least years old and the person to whom your wine will be delivered is also at least years old The person receiving delivery will be required to show identification proving that he or she is at least years old Choose a method of payment a Payment by Credit Card Your card will automatically be charged the total amount above b Payment by Check Payment in full must be received within days A fee applies to all returned checks Make check payable to Winebidcom Inc and mail it to PO Box Napa CA c Payment by Wire Please inquire for instructions NOTE Shipping authorization I have read and understand Winebidcoms shipping policy By signing this invoice I am verifying that I am at least years old and the shipping address is correct If needed I authorize Winebidcom to store my wine at no charge in a temperature controlled storage until the weather permits shipment and to charge my credit card for the full purchase price at this time Sign here X authorizing Winebidcom to act on your behalf to make arrangements for the shipment of your order Thanks from all of us at Winebidcom Michael McKeogh Daytime Tel Fax Number Email

Fwd Collecting Fine Wine Just Got Easierbit Returnpath Received from mtarcsntxswbellnet mtaprrcsntxswbellnet by simsrcsntxswbellnet Sun Internet Mail Server simsp with ESMTP id Thu Jun CDT Received from listswinebidcom by mtarcsntxswbellnet Sun Internet Mail Server simsp with SMTP id Thu Jun CDT Received from winebidcom by listswinebidcom with SMTP Thu Jun Date Thu Jun From winebidcom Subject Collecting Fine Wine Just Got Easier Sender To June Messageid BDE MIMEversion Contenttype textplain charsetUSASCII Precedence Bulk UserAgent MicrosoftEntourage XMozillaStatus At WINEBIDCOM we believe collecting fine wine should be enjoyable and easy So weve made a few changes to our online auction that we think will streamline browsing and bidding for your favorite wines From now on your email address will serve as your identification code When you sign in simply use your email address and the same password you use now This means you no longer have to remember a digit identification code Type in your email address and the same password youve always used and youre ready to go Youll also notice that WINEBIDCOM is now one big global auction If youre hunting for Bordeaux you no longer need to look in three separate auctions All the Bordeaux offered for bid will appear in a single auction regardless of where Winebidcom is storing it This way you wont miss a single bottle As in the past we show you where WINEBIDCOM is holding the wine and wines stored in countries other than the one in which you live are still subject to added taxes duties and shipping charges Finally we hope youll notice the results of some of our behind the scenes technological improvements We want to minimize the time you spend waiting for information about Bordeaux Burgundies Chardonnays Cabernets Pinot Noirs or whatever fine wines youre adding to your cellar We want to make it simple to find the worlds most exceptional wines Our next auction begins opening Thursday June at pm EDT Happy hunting If you click on a link in this email and it doesnt open properly in your browser try copying and pasting the link directly into your browsers address or location field Forget your password Fwd Visit to your winerybit Returnpath Received from mtarcsntxswbellnet mtaprrcsntxswbellnet by simsrcsntxswbellnet Sun Internet Mail Server simsp with ESMTP id for imsmsdaemon Mon Sep CDT Received from marinesonicnet by mtarcsntxswbellnet Sun Internet Mail Server simsp with SMTP id for imsrcsntxswbellnet Mon Sep CDT Received qmail invoked from network Tue Sep Received from subsonicnet by marinesonicnet with SMTP Tue Sep Received from loie enassonicnet by subsonicnet with SMTP id VAA for Mon Sep Date Mon Sep From Dan Goldfield Subject Re Visit to your winery To Messageid cdebaecdloie MIMEversion XMailer Microsoft Outlook Express Contenttype textplain charsetiso Xenvelopeinfo XMSMailPriority Normal XMimeOLE Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V References XPriority XMozillaStatus Sara Im looking foreword to seeing you Lets speak by phone before you come in Im sure we could work something out on one of the days you prefer Im in the thick of it fight now so its a bit hard to think of the specifics at the moment Looking foreword to speaking with you dan Original Message From To Sent Monday September PM Subject Visit to your winery Hi Dan Ill be in NapaSonoma during the second week of October specifically on Monday Wednesday October and Please let me know which day is convenient for you for me to drop by and say hello and take that case of pinot noir off your hands If the timing works for you I think that Tuesday or Wednesday would be preferable for me Ill be staying in Napa I look forward to hearing from you I hope you received me earlier message Thanks Sara
